channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Cloud Private
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Cloud Private

item.title: CVE-2019-4284|2024-09-17T01:45:57.622Z -- ibm -- cloud%20private
item.description: IBM Cloud Private 2.1.0 , 3.1.0, 3.1.1, and 3.1.2 could allow a local privileged user to obtain sensitive OIDC token that is printed to log files, which could be used to log in to the system as another user. IBM X-Force ID: 160512.

item.title: CVE-2018-1937|2024-09-17T02:36:57.031Z -- ibm -- cloud%20private
item.description: IBM Cloud Private 3.1.1 could alllow a local user with administrator privileges to intercept highly sensitive unencrypted data. IBM X-Force ID: 153317.

item.title: CVE-2019-4143|2024-09-17T00:10:51.983Z -- ibm -- cloud%20private
item.description: The IBM Cloud Private Key Management Service (IBM Cloud Private 3.1.1 and 3.1.2) could allow a local user to obtain sensitive from the KMS plugin container log. IBM X-Force ID: 158348.

item.title: CVE-2019-4117|2024-09-17T00:41:30.635Z -- ibm -- cloud%20private
item.description: IBM Cloud Private 3.1.1 and 3.1.2 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 158116.
